short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays original and displayed pixel sizes of media elements when hovered.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PixelPeek is a lightweight and powerful Chrome extension that lets you inspect pixel dimensions of images, videos, icons, buttons, and more on any webpage. Hover over media elements, and PixelPeek will show you their pixel sizes instantly.
